snippet: A group of Occupy Wall Street protesters arrested last year for breaking into a lot owned by the church, once considered an ally of the movement, are preparing for their trials to start.
abstract: Group of Occupy Wall Street protesters arrested last year for breaking into a lot owned by the Trinity Church, once considered an ally of the movement, are preparing for their trials to start.
lead_paragraph: A group of Occupy Wall Street protesters arrested last year for breaking into a lot owned by the church, once considered an ally of the movement, are preparing for their trials to start.

headline.seo: Trespassing Case Adds Strain to Church’s Ties With Occupy Protesters
headline.main: Trespassing Case Adds Strain to Trinity Church’s Ties With Occupy Protesters
headline.print_headline: Trespassing Case Adds Strain to Trinity Church’s Ties With Occupy Protesters
